column5: I am heading up to this resort on July 2nd and am curious if anyone who uses this great site has any information regarding the lodge and the fishing. Any suggestions regarding gear for walleye and do you have any opinions on the quality of the guides? I appreciate the information.

i have been to elk island lodge 4 times fishing was always good we mostly fished for lake trout lots of action.we also caught several trophy walleye.guides were good .ask for greg owners son , very good guide and trys all day long to find big fish. food great
